body_html: Can you give example code that exhibits the problem. Essentially when you call session.run() you ask for a given op and every dependent of that has to be run. You have a dependency on something called "Gradients/..." (that's where the error is showing up). I feel like you might be pulling on a training op or something dependent on a training op. If not, it is somewhat strange. Either way you could work to modify the build to add ops, but it is quite difficult.

body: Can you give example code that exhibits the problem. Essentially when you call session.run() you ask for a given op and every dependent of that has to be run. You have a dependency on something called "Gradients/..." (that's where the error is showing up). I feel like you might be pulling on a training op or something dependent on a training op. If not, it is somewhat strange. Either way you could work to modify the build to add ops, but it is quite difficult.
